name: gtaw-chatlog-magician
description: Convert GTA World chat logs into beautifully formatted images

scripts.test: echo "No tests yet - run npm run test:setup to add testing" && exit 0
scripts.test:setup: npm install --save-dev vitest @vitest/ui && echo "Testing setup complete! Add tests in /tests directory"
scripts.lint: echo "Linting setup needed - run npm run lint:setup"
scripts.lint:setup: npm install --save-dev eslint prettier && npx eslint --init
scripts.format: echo "Prettier setup needed - run npm run lint:setup first"

author: blancodagoat, asapdev
